Term Frequency - Inverse Document Frequency¶

Preprocessing object for obtaining a tfidf numerical matrix @author: Angel Navia Vázquez

class MMLL.preprocessors.tfidf_matrix.tfidf_matrix_model(vocab, df_dict, input_data_description)¶

Bases: object

Parameters

  • vocab (list of string) – Vocabulary to ne used

  • df_dict (dict) – Document frequency counts.

  • input_data_description (dict) – Description of the input features
